articles.title: Decision of Political Bureau of C.C., WPK on Marking Feb. 8 as KPA Birthday
articles.content:
Political Bureau of C.C., WPK Decides to Mark Feb. 8 as KPA Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Monday announced the decision to mark February 8 as the founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 According to the decision, Feb. 8, Juche 37 (1948) is a historic day when the Korean People's Revolutionary Army developed into the regular revolutionary armed forces to declare the birth of the KPA.
					
					 Considering the foundation of a strong regular army to be essential for the building of an independent and sovereign state after the liberation of the country, President Kim Il Sung founded the KPA, the Juche-type revolutionary regular armed forces, which inherited the anti-Japanese tradition, in a span of less than three years with his outstanding idea of army-building and energetic leadership.
					
					 The Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK decided as follows to add luster to the revolutionary feats of the President, the founder and builder of the heroic KPA:
					
					1.  February 8, Juche 37 (1948) when the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung developed the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the regular revolutionary armed forces will be marked as the founding anniversary of the KPA. 
					
					 In this regard, April 25, Juche 21 (1932) when he founded the first revolutionary armed forces will be marked as the founding anniversary of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army.
					
					2. February 8 will be marked as the Army-Building Day.
					
					3. The Party organizations at all levels will conduct politico-ideological education and significantly hold diverse events for making the service personnel, Party members and other working people deeply grasp the feats of the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung for building of the regular revolutionary armed forces on the occasion of Feb. 8 every year.
					
					4. The Cabinet and other relevant organs will take practical steps to significantly mark the founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: North Side's Delegation for Field Survey Visits South Side's Area
articles.content:
North Side's Delegation for Field Survey Visits South Side's Area
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The delegation for field survey headed by Hyon Song Wol, head of the Samjiyon Orchestra, visited the south side's area from Sunday for a one-night and two-day visit in accordance with the agreement at the inter-Korean working-level talks for the dispatch of our art troupe held on Jan. 15.
					 The delegation consisting of seven persons learned about the preparation for the ensuring of the performance of our art troupe to be given in Kangrung and Seoul of south Korea with the 23rd Winter Olympics as an occasion.

articles.title: Reception Given by ASEAN Committee in DPRK
articles.content:
Reception Given by ASEAN Committee in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The ASEAN Committee in the DPRK on Tuesday gave a reception on the New Year Juche 107 (2018).
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Yong Ho, foreign minister of the DPRK, and officials concerned.
					
					 On hand were Cambodian Ambassador Sin Bunthoeurn, chairman of the ASEAN Committee in the DPRK, and Lao Ambassador Phonekham Inthaboualy, Indonesian Ambassador Bambang Hiendrasto and Vietnamese Ambassador Pham Viet Hung.

articles.title: President of NBC of U.S. Leaves
articles.content:
President of NBC of U.S. Leaves
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Oppenheim Noah David, president of the National Broadcasting Company of the U.S., and his party left here for home on Tuesday.

articles.title: U.S. Blasted for Their Military Provocation
articles.content:
U.S. Blasted for Their Military Provocation
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The director of Press of the Institute for American Studies, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, gave an answer to a question raised by KCNA on Jan. 23 as regards the increased level of military threat by the United States to the DPRK.
					 A rare atmosphere of easing tension on the Korean peninsula is now being created as the inter-Korean talks are held on our participation in the 23rd Winter Olympics. On the contrary, however, the United States is making extremely unusual military moves targeting our country, the director said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. has moved the nuclear-powered aircraft carrier strike group "Carl Vinson" into the waters around the Korean peninsula and plans to dispatch soon another nuclear-powered aircraft carrier strike group "Stennis", under the pretext of countering a possible "provocation" of the DPRK during the Winter Olympics.
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. is going to send a special operation unit to south Korea under the pretext of "anti-terror" during the Winter Olympics and it has made public that it will conduct test launch of ICBM "Minuteman-3" around February.
					
					 Such provocative military maneuvers of the U.S. are acts that throw a wet blanket over the atmosphere of improving inter-Korean relations and defusing tension on the Korean peninsula hard-won by our initiative and magnanimity, and these cannot be justified by any means.
					
					 The latest continued military moves of the U.S. are based on the cunning scheme to block the improvement of inter-Korean relations by inveigling us into taking hardline countermeasures and to impute the blame of increasing tension on us.  
					
					 Our Republic cherishes peace but never begs for it, and we will take resolute countermeasures against any acts of destroying peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 In case the situation on the Korean peninsula falls again into a vortex of aggravation due to the reckless military moves of the U.S., full responsibility for the consequence will rest with the U.S.

articles.title: We Will Never Pardon S. Korean Conservative Forces' Shuddering Hideous Crime against Dignity of DPRK
articles.content:
We Will Never Pardon S. Korean Conservative Forces' Shuddering Hideous Crime against Dignity of DPRK
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK issued the following statement Tuesday:
					 A breakthrough was made in the improvement of the north-south ties and there is a warm wind for reconciliation thanks to the DPRK's sincere efforts, to be warmly welcomed by the whole Korean nation and the world.
					
					 But the puppet conservative forces have gone beyond a tolerance limit in their ill intention to chill the atmosphere for the improved north-south ties and ruin the great event of the nation, shocking the public at home and abroad.
					
					 A hideous provocative act, openly perpetrated in downtown Seoul in broad daylight on Jan 22, clearly proved that the wild act of the group of traitors challenging the trend of the national history toward the improvement of the north-south ties and reunification has reached the extremes.
					
					 Timed to coincide with the arrival of our field survey delegation for dispatch of an art troupe in Seoul that day, coteries of the "Korean Patriotic Party" flocked to the plaza of Seoul Railways Station where they held a press interview and viciously slandered the DPRK's participation in the Olympics.
					
					 They went on the rampage, torching a portrait symbolizing the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership and a DPRK flag, not content with talking hoarse that "Phyongchang Olympics is about to change into Pyongyang Olympics for promoting the north's social system and making the north's nuclear weapons a fait accompli" and "dispatch of the north's cheering group and joint training at the Masikryong Ski Resort are an attempt to bring to naught the sweats and efforts exerted by inhabitants in Kangwon Province and Phyongchang".
					
					 This is a never-to-be-condoned hideous crime as it is an intolerable mockery of the sincerity and efforts being made by the DPRK for the improvement of the north-south relations and a deliberate political provocation to turn the Olympics into a theatre for escalating confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 Far from making a deep bow to the fellow countrymen for their sincere efforts for the successful Olympics, the conservative group resorted to all sorts of slandering and committed such shuddering acts in the eyes of the delegation of the DPRK. They are a despicable group of gangsters in human form.
					
					 The conservative forces who had been pushed into the cesspool of history being severely punished by history for their acts of treachery under the armpit of Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye, are now going on the rampage, making hideous provocations. This is a shame to the nation.
					
					 It is deplorable that due to a handful of betes noires, our efforts and the desire of all Koreans to make the Olympics a great auspicious event common to the nation are being mocked and dark clouds lay low over the prospect of the Olympics.
					
					 The puppet conservative forces are human rejects devoid of appearance as human beings, to say nothing of elementary etiquette and manners toward the fellow countrymen, and dregs of history that would do only harm to the nation if they are allowed to go at large.
					
					 It is quite natural that the south Koreans from all walks of life raise their voices calling for throwing overboard those rubbish so that they would not give off stinking smell any more, being concerned that such acts omen new trouble in the north-south relations.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the south Korean authorities' behavior of conniving at such serious politically-motivated provocation.
					
					 As we truly hoped for the Olympics becoming a theater for promoting trust and reconciliation between the north and the south, we repeatedly advised and warned them so as to keep any acts that may incite mistrust and confrontation between the fellow countrymen and get on the nerves of the dialogue partner from being occurred.
					
					 Even though they watched the reckless confrontation moves committed by the conservatives, the south Korean authorities have taken a non-committal stand, reading the faces of those conservatives who are no more than living corpses, while talking about "freedom of expression" and only asking them to "restrain". No wonder, the situation is turning out to be worse, far from being brought under control.
					
					 This is little short of egging the conservative group on to foster such acts so that they go on the rampage.
					
					 The criminal acts committed by the conservative forces with no fear of divine punishment have now greatly enraged the people of the DPRK.
					
					 We will never tolerate hideous acts of the conservative hooligans who insulted the sacred dignity and symbol of the DPRK, and the dishonest behavior of the south Korean authorities who connived at such acts, and we can not but take a serious consideration of our follow-up measures regarding the Winter Olympics.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have to apologize before the nation for the political provocation, severely punish those involved in the crime and take a prompt measure to prevent the recurrence of such acts.
					
					 If the north-south agreement and schedules for the DPRK's participation in the Olympics are cancelled due to the confrontational act of the conservative riff-raffs keen on spouting vituperation and committing provocative acts against the fellow countrymen, the blame will wholly rest with the conservative group and the south Korean authorities. 
					
					 We value the north-south ties but have no intention to continue to show good faith and magnanimity even while seeing the confrontational fanatics dare challenge the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its sacred symbol.
					
					 We will closely follow the future attitude of the south Korean authorities concerning the recent hideous crime.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Censures U.S. Military Acts Coiling up Regional Tension
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Censures U.S. Military Acts Coiling up Regional Tension
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is persistently resorting to the dangerous military acts of going against the aspiration of the public at home and abroad for detente on the Korean Peninsula.
					 From the beginning of this year the U.S. successively sent nuclear carrier flotillas and nuclear strategic bombers to the vicinity of the peninsula. It announced that it would conduct two ICBM test-fires next month.
					
					 This can never be allowed as it is a revelation of the sinister intention to block the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and aggravate the situation in the region.
					
					 Peace and security on the Korean Peninsula are directly linked with world peace and security. That is why the international community hails the climate for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations provided thanks to our proactive proposal and calls for encouraging and promoting it.
					
					 Contrary to this, the U.S. openly increases the military pressure upon the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and unhesitatingly upsets the balance of armed forces in the region.
					
					 It is self-evident that ICBM test-fire would not be "fireworks" for the Winter Olympics.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that media of the U.S. say that war maniacs do not cover up their precaution against the prospect for peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is now trying to justify such moves under the pretence of "guaranteeing Olympics" and "already planned". However, it can never veil the wicked intention.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that any military action of the U.S. will lead to the aggravation of the tension in the region and it would not bring good consequences.
					
					 The U.S. acts are clearly targeted against peace in the Korean Peninsula and the region and they disclose the true colors of the U.S. standing for confrontation and war, not dialogue and peace.
					
					 Genuine peace and stability have not settled in the Korean Peninsula and the region for a long time. The reality makes the people understand where the root cause is.
					
					 The DPRK will never allow any act of wrecking peace and security in the Peninsula but will decisively counter it.
					
					 The U.S. should always remember that the entire Korean nation and international community vigilantly watch the sinister military acts of deliberately aggravating the situation.

articles.title: National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Opens
articles.content:
National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Opens
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The 44th National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street Tuesday.
					 The contest brings together more than 10,000 members of school sports groups who proved successful at city, county and provincial preliminaries. They will compete in 19 events including Taekwon-Do, ssirum (Korean wrestling), basketball, swimming and skiing.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee, Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, and other officials concerned and officials of the youth league and school youth and children.

articles.title: Production of Light Industrial Goods Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Production of Light Industrial Goods Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Factories under the Ministry of Light Industry of the DPRK are pushing forward the drive to reenergize the production of light industrial goods to carry out the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Textile mills are pushing ahead with the work to remodel shuttle looms and iron looms to be pneumatic ones.
					
					 They are working hard to make soda alginate, washing agent, leveling agent and other chemical materials by their own efforts and put the rayon production on a Juche basis.
					
					 Knitwear factories manufactured the high-temperature, high-pressure piece dyeing machine to improve the quality of goods and normalize production on a high level.
					
					 They are paying big efforts to perfecting the technical processes for the development of cloth for men and women's swimsuit and the production of colored stretch yarn and colored rubber thread with domestic raw materials.
					
					 They are also stepping up the work to supply softener, hydrogen peroxide and chemical auxiliary material for producing elastics by their own efforts.
					
					 Shoes factories introduced automatic gumming machines and manufactured more than 50 single-purpose equipment to perfect production processes.
					
					 They introduced adhesives for athletic sports shoes into production.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialist Armed Spy Ship Pueblo Detained in DPRK for 50 Years
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialist Armed Spy Ship Pueblo Detained in DPRK for 50 Years
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- It has been 50 years since the U.S. imperialist armed spy ship Pueblo was detained by the DPRK.
					 The ship is floating on the Pothong River in Pyongyang where the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum is located.
					
					 DPRK Hero and naval officer Pak In Ho who displayed bravery as the head of a searching party when capturing the spy ship, has worked as a lecturer at the museum for nearly 20 years.
					
					 When interviewed by KCNA, 79 year-old Pak said with pride that he used to say to the visitors that Pueblo is a U.S. armed spy ship captured by the Korean People's Army (KPA) and it is only the KPA Navy that exhibited the U.S. imperialist naval vessel as a trophy in the world.
					
					 The U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo illegally intruded into the territorial waters of the DPRK and committed military spying, but it was captured by the self-defense measures of the KPA Navy on January 23, 1968.
					
					 The KPA seamen contained the spy ship just within 14 minutes and captured 80-odd U.S. scoundrels.
					
					 At that time, the U.S. drove the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war by dispatching its nuclear aircraft carrier Enterprise and mobile strike forces to the East Sea of Korea while threatening to use nuclear weapons unless the DPRK would send back the spy ship.
					
					 However the DPRK declared its stand that it would react to the U.S. "retaliation" with retaliation and to an all-out war with an all-out war. The DPRK's toughest stance forced the U.S. to sign a letter of apology that the government gives firm assurance that no U.S. ship will intrude into the territorial waters of the DPRK again in the future.
					
					 Going round the spy ship, a foreigner said that the U.S. imperialist Yankees trumpet often that the "Statue of Liberty" and the "first" military strength are the symbol of the United States of America, but it is a wrong opinion, the symbol of the U.S. is Pueblo bound as POW.
					
					 Kim Wi Hyok, a student of Pyongyang Music School No. 1 of Kim Won Gyun Conservatory, said that he felt a pleasant sensation of a victor looking at the photos of the captain and crewmen of Pueblo lifting their hands and writing confession.
					
					 Kim Kwang Hyok, a naval officer of the KPA, said that the Pueblo incident is clear evidence showing the crushing defeat of the U.S. in the showdown with the DPRK, adding that he will mercilessly destroy those who infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK even an inch, staking the honor of Korea of Juche.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Political and Ideological Might of DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Political and Ideological Might of DPRK
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article says that the political and ideological might serves as great motive force for paving a wide avenue for building a powerful socialist country.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Our political and ideological might is the strongest power guaranteeing the invincibility of socialism of Juche and powerful engine for putting the military, economic, cultural and all other fields on the high plane of a powerful socialist country.
					
					 And it serves as a fundamental source to raise the speed for building a powerful socialist country to the maximum.
					
					 The most powerful weapon for defending socialism is single-hearted unity of the army and people around their leader.
					
					 Our socialism has won victory after victory despite all sorts of hardships in the history because the army and people and socialism form a community united by the same destiny.
					
					 The world-startling successes have been achieved by the political and ideological might in the DPRK without let-up.
					
					 The world will clearly witness how socialist Korea will reach its high eminence of victory by advancing and struggling to attain the higher goal without remaining self-complacent with the achievements.
					
					 Though we have vast yet difficult tasks to be carried out, we are certain to emerge victorious in our general offensive this year as long as there are the seasoned leadership of the great Party and the might of single-hearted unity of the army and people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Conservatives Keen on Messing up Great Event of Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Conservatives Keen on Messing up Great Event of Nation
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The north-south communication lines that had been shut down are now resumed and a door to dialogue that had been stalled is opened. At Panmunjom the fellow countrymen in the north and south sat face to face, making a promise to take a first starting step for the improvement of the north-south ties and producing results startling the world one after another.
					 However, the die-hard conservative media of south Korea, seized by submission toward the U.S. and confrontation with the fellow countrymen, are now barking like a rabid dog, disclosing their sordid nature, quite contrary to the prevailing situation, Rodong Sinmun says in an article Tuesday, adding:
					
					 It was the south Koreans and the mindset of the inhabitants in the area hosting the Olympics that have longed for the dispatch of the DPRK's players' group and cheering group to the Olympics, regarding it as a crucial issue on which hinges the success of the Olympics.
					
					 With full consideration of such mindset of the south Koreans and out of sincere hope for the successful holding of the international games which are to be held in the area near the Military Demarcation Line, we made a bold and magnanimous proposal startling the world at the outset of the year.
					
					 It goes without saying that it is south Korea which is to benefit most from the great measures taken by the DPRK.
					
					 However, those who are not able to put even a bowl of rice on the feast table, are spouting criticism, far from making a deep bow of thanks. They are, indeed, a group of ignorant gangsters bereft of elementary obligation and duty, to say nothing of the qualifications as media persons.
					
					 We warn once again the south Korean conservative media persons that the north-south relationship may be disrupted though it took the first good step and an unpredictable incident may occur due to misrepresentation made by them not being thoughtful of the possible consequences.

articles.title: U.S. Dangerous Arms-Buildup Flailed by Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Dangerous Arms-Buildup Flailed by Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has now become keen on its moves to aggravate the situation, quite contrary to the atmosphere of detente created on the Korean peninsula, says a commentary of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday.
					 The U.S. imperialist warmongers are now scheming to deploy in south Korea the 1st tank brigade of the U.S. third division from the U.S. mainland for the first time after the Korean War under the pretext of "rotational deployment". They have already advance-deployed six B-52 strategic bombers and three B-2 strategic bombers on Guam.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 This is a dangerous military move to tarnish the atmosphere for the improvement of ties between the north and the south.
					
					 The U.S. arms buildup is a clear revelation of its sinister intention to aggravate the situation of the Korean peninsula and the region and disrupt the great events of the Korean nation.
					
					 The U.S. should not run amuck, clearly understanding the desire of the Korean nation for peace and reunification and the will of the DPRK to mercilessly foil the outsiders' aggression moves and defend the sovereignty and dignity of the nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Derides Panic-Stricken U.S.
articles.content:
Minju Joson Derides Panic-Stricken U.S.
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Tuesday derides the deplorable situation of the U.S. which is now on jitters, being seized by "fear of the north's missiles."
					 A ballistic missile threat warning was released throughout Hawaii, U.S. by a mistake recently. As soon as the message was delivered to smart phones of citizens and tourists to the effect that "a ballistic missile is on its way to Hawaii, Evacuate immediately. It is not training", the whole island was thrown into utter confusion. A few days later, the citizens in Michigan, U.S. experienced the same horror as what those on Hawaii did.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which is trembling with fear, stricken by extreme horror and pressure even by a single message and by a flash in the sky, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The mindset of the panic-stricken Americans is that the higher the level of confrontation with the DPRK, the world-level nuclear power and a rocket power, the higher the level of disaster to be inflicted upon them.
					
					 They are now unanimous in their opinion that the only way-out is to avoid confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should no longer shun the situation.
					
					 Its "pressure" on the DPRK will never work and the reckless stand-off will only lead the U.S. to destruction.
					
					 The U.S. had better find a way-out of its miserable situation caused by its hostile policy toward the DPRK, not clinging to the confrontation policy that invites disasters only.

articles.title: S. Korean LKP Coteries' Mischievous Behavior under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean LKP Coteries' Mischievous Behavior under Fire
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The "Liberal Korea Party" of south Korea has now gone desperate to tarnish the atmosphere of the north-south relations that was created by the initiative measures taken by the DPRK.
					 The representative of the LKP and its floor leader are now zealous in describing the landmark proposals made by the DPRK for the improved north-south relations as "an attempt to incite conflict" between south Korea and the U.S., "one for gaining time for completing the nuclear weapons" and a "half-witted camouflaged peace offensive". As for the north-south high-ranking talks, they are spouting ill-boding words that "the talks only paved the way for the north to unfold its assertions" and "south-north dialogue has to presuppose a solution to the north's nuclear issue". They went the lengths of saying that "there should not be any lobbying with the north" and "the north's intention for provocation hidden behind the sports exchanges should not be overlooked" and "the international cooperation for sanctions on the north may shake due to the north's participation in the Olympics".
					
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Tuesday brands this as a mischievous act of the LKP group seized by inveterate concept of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The nation's desire and wish can never come true as long as the conservative forces are allowed to exist, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The more frantically the LKP coteries resort to the racket for confrontation with the DPRK, the earlier they will face their miserable end.
					
					 The whole Korean nation should definitely foil the desperate moves of the LKP aimed to challenge the desire of the nation and the trend of the times and to put a brake in the improvement of the north-south ties.

articles.title: Conservative Opposition Parties' Amalgamation under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Conservative Opposition Parties' Amalgamation under Fire in S. Korea
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo posted an article on Monday denouncing the groups of the Kukmin Party and the Parun Party for staging a farce of amalgamation.
					 The new amalgamated party of coteries from the two parties set it as the main direction of its major policies to call for "war deterrent based on the solid south Korea-U.S. alliance, solution of the north's nuclear issue" and "free and solid development of market economy," not hiding its true colors as a pro-U.S. and neo-liberal party, the article said.
					
					 It stressed that An Chol Su will face the judgment by public and history for his pro-U.S. flunkeyist and separatist nature.

articles.title: Release of Prisoners of Conscience and Uprooting of Evils Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of Prisoners of Conscience and Uprooting of Evils Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held the 1154th Thursday rally in Seoul on January 18, demanding the release of prisoners of conscience and the uprooting of the deep-seated evils, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 Speakers at the rally said that the authorities should probe the truth behind the suspicious case of "defection from the north" cooked up by the Intelligence Service and repatriate women citizens of the north and unconverted long-term prisoners.
					
					 They also demanded the "Security Law" be abrogated, the IS disbanded and traitor Lee Myung Bak arrested.

articles.title: S. Korean Public Demand Lee Myung Bak's Arrest
articles.content:
S. Korean Public Demand Lee Myung Bak's Arrest
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The "Commando for Seizing MB" and the Headquarters of the Action for Trial of Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye in south Korea held a demonstration and a candlelight rally in Seoul on January 20 in demand of traitor Lee Myung Bak's arrest, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of Seoul.
					 The participants started a demonstration march surrounding the traitor's house with a car carrying a slogan board "Arrest Lee Myung Bak" in the van and held a candlelight rally.
					
					 At the candlelight rally, speakers demanded that the authorities punish Lee in accordance with law.
					
					 They declared that the people would fight against the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye forces to the end to surely throw Lee, boss of deep-seated evils, into prison.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Benin
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- A Benin national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Cotonou on Jan. 12.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who doubles as chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to widely introduce Kim Jong Il's exploits through media and organize political and cultural events including a joint meeting and a film show on the occasion of his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Moscow Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Russia on Jan. 12.
					 Mikhail Vikulin Mikhailovich, chief of the group, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including seminars on Kim Jong Il's works on the occasion of his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported in South Africa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported in South Africa
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The Mfumalanga Provincial Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of South Africa made public a statement on Jan. 12 in support of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 The statement warmly congratulated the Korean people on their brilliant successes registered under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un last year.
					
					 It noted that the DPRK smashed the moves of the U.S. imperialists engrossed in sanctions and military threats against other countries in a wild dream to dominate the whole world and bolstered up its military capability for self-defence.
					
					 It stressed that in no way would the U.S. dare to ignite a war against the DPRK now.
					
					 The DPRK will surely make a breakthrough in reenergizing the overall economic front this year, the third year of implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development, the statement said, adding:
					
					 We will invariably support the Korean people in the future, too.
					
					 We heartily wish rosy future and prosperity to them.

articles.title: DPRK Upsets "World Order" Orchestrated by U.S.: Nigerian Body
articles.content:
DPRK Upsets "World Order" Orchestrated by U.S.: Nigerian Body
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on Jan. 14 posted on its website an article titled "There is no match for the power of independence and justice".
					 Noting that 2017 was a noteworthy year when a fundamental change occurred in global political structure and balance of forces surrounding the Korean Peninsula, the article said:
					
					 The unheard-of military threats and sanctions and pressure of the U.S. and its vassal forces, aimed at blocking the victorious advance of socialist Korea, went to extremes.
					
					 Nevertheless, the national power and prestige of the DPRK, which emerged a new strategic state smashing the arrogance and bluff of the U.S., the "only superpower", under the eyes of the world, shook the U.S.-orchestrated "world order" to its foundation.
					
					 The successful test of H-bomb ready for ICBM was a signal victory that put the DPRK among the world's nuclear powers and laid a firm military foundation making it possible to put an end to the history of nuclear blackmail of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Juche Korea clarified its toughest counteraction will to tame the U.S. with fire without fail.
					
					 The new-type ICBM Hwasong-15 capable of striking the whole U.S. mainland and carrying super-heavy nuclear warhead was launched into the sky displaying the tremendous might of the DPRK, a world-level military power.
					
					 The DPRK government stated that its development and bolstering of strategic weapons are totally aimed at defending the country's sovereignty and territorial integrity and the people's peaceful life from the U.S. imperialists' policy of nuclear blackmail and threat and, therefore, those weapons will not pose any threat to any country and region as long as the DPRK's interests are not violated.

articles.title: BP del CC del PTC decide celebrar el 8 de febrero como Dia de Fundacion del EPC
articles.content:
BP del CC del PTC decide celebrar el 8 de febrero como Dia de Fundacion del EPC
Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ACNC) -- El Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea publico el dia 22 la resolucion de definir el 8 de febrero como Dia de Fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Segun el documento, el 8 de febrero del 37 (1948) de la Era Juche es el dia historico en que se declaro el nacimiento del Ejercito Popular de Corea mediante el desarrollo del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea (ERPC) como fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares.
					
					Despues de la liberacion de Corea, el Presidente Kim Il Sung presento la fundacion de un poderoso ejercito regular como requisito indispensable de la construccion de un Estado independiente y soberano y con su extraordinaria ideologia sobre esa materia y energica direccion, fundo en menos de 3 anos el EPC, fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares del tipo Juche que continuan la tradicion de la guerra antijaponesa.
					
					A fin de glorificar las proezas revolucionarias del Presidente Kim Il Sung, fundador y constructor del heroico EPC, el BP del CC del PTC resuelve como lo siguiente:
					
					1. El 8 de febrero del 37 (1948) cuando el Presidente Kim Il Sung desarrollo el ERPC como fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares sera el Dia de Fundacion del EPC.
					
					El 25 de abril del 21 (1932) de la Era Juche en que el fundo las primeras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias sera el Dia de Fundacion del ERPC.
					
					2. El 8 de febrero se conmemorara como Dia de Fundacion del Ejercito.
					
					3. En ocasion del 8 de febrero de cada ano, las organizaciones partidistas de todos los niveles desarrollaran de manera significativa la educacion ideo-politica y diversos actos para hacer a los militares del EPC, militantes del partido y trabajadores asimilar bien las proezas realizadas por el Presidente por la construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares.
					
					4. El Consejo de Ministros y otras instituciones correspondientes tomaran medidas de trabajo para festejar significativamente el Dia de Fundacion del EPC.

articles.title: La delegacion nortena de recorrido en el terreno visita la region surcoreana
articles.content:
La delegacion nortena de recorrido en el terreno visita la region surcoreana
Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ACNC) -- Segun el acuerdo de las conversaciones de trabajo Norte-Sur por el envio del grupo artistico de la parte Norte efectuadas el dia 15, la delegacion de recorrido en el terreno, encabezada por la jefa de la Orquesta Samjiyon, Hyon Song Wol, visito al Sur de Corea desde el dia 21 con la jornada de una noche y dos dias.
					La delegacion compuesta por 7 miembros averiguo el estado de preparativos para asegurar la funcion del grupo artistico de la parte nortena que se ofrecera en Kangrung y Seul en ocasion de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.

articles.title: Portavoz del CRPP advierte a los maniacos surcoreanos de enfrentamiento fratricida
articles.content:
Portavoz del CRPP advierte a los maniacos surcoreanos de enfrentamiento fratricida
Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 23 la siguiente declaracion:
					Gracias a nuestros esfuerzos sinceros, se abre el arremetedero de mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas y se da la atmosfera de reconciliacion nacional, hecho que causa fuertes aplausos de toda la nacion y todo el mundo. 
					
					En contraste, dejan consternados a los nacionales y extranjeros las acciones demenciales de los conservadores surcoreanos encaminadas a congelar el ambiente favorable a la mejora de relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y llevar al fracaso los eventos nacionales. 
					
					El tremendo caso de provocacion, ocurrido el dia 22 a plena luz del dia en la parte centrica de Seul, muestra a que grado llega el desafio de ellos a la corriente de la historia nacional hacia la mejora de relaciones Norte-Sur y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Ese dia, coincidiendo con la llegada a Seul de la delegacion de recorrido en el terreno de la parte Norte para el envio del grupo de artistas, los tipejos del Partido Patriotico de Corea sostuvieron en la Plaza de la Estacion de Seul una conferencia de prensa censurando brutalmente la participacion de la RPDC en los Juegos Olimpicos. 
					
					Ellos chismearon en esa ocasion que "la Olimpiada de Phyongchang se convierte en la de Pyongyang para hacer propaganda del regimen norcoreano y reconocer su posesion de arma nuclear" y "el envio del grupo de hinchas del Norte y los ejercicios conjuntos en el Campo de Esqui Masikryong parten del intento de hacer nulos el sudor y los esfuerzos de la poblacion de la provincia de Kangwon y de Phyongchang".
					
					Como si esto fuera poco, quemaron hasta la bandera de la RPDC y el retrato considerado como simbolo de la dignidad de nuestra Direccion Suprema.
					
					Este crimen resulta una burla intolerable a los esfuerzos sinceros de la RPDC por la mejora de vinculos Norte-Sur y una premeditada provocacion politica para convertir los juegos olimpicos en el escenario de enfrentamiento fratricida. 
					
					Lejos de agradecer a la parte connacional que hace todo lo posible para la celebracion exitosa del festival deportivo, los gangsteres conservadores surcoreanos dijeron blasfemias de toda indole y cometieron dicho crimen inimaginable y escalofriante en la cara de nuestra delegacion. 
					
					Es una verguenza nacional que los remanentes conservadores, condenados por la historia por sus crimenes traidores cometidos bajo el amparo de Lee Myung Bak y Park Geun-hye, anduvieran otra vez con la frente alta volviendo a escenificar tremendos actos provocativos. 
					
					Es muy lamentable que debido a un punado de esos desperdicios biologicos, sean burlados los esfuerzos de la RPDC y el anhelo de toda la nacion de celebrar los juegos olimpicos como una fiesta comun de la nacion y se entenebrezcan las perspectivas de esta cita deportiva. 
					
					Los conservadores surcoreanos son basuras de la historia que no observan la elemental cortesia ni la moralidad sobre la parte connacional y hacen danos a la nacion. 
					
					Es natural que los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes estratos reclamaran en voz alta enterrar lo mas pronto posible a esas escorias humanas diciendo que las locuras de estas anuncian nuevo contratiempo de las relaciones N-S. 
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es la actitud de las autoridades surcoreanas que dejaron a los conservadores cometer publicamente su grave provocacion politica. 
					
					Con el deseo de que los Juegos Olimpicos se hagan el escenario para promover la confianza y reconciliacion entre ambas partes coreanas, dimos a las autoridades surcoreanas consejos y advertencias suficientes para que ellas hagan lo que les toca en prevenir todas formas de actos que azucen la desconfianza y confrontacion entre los compatriotas e irriten a la contraparte.
					
					Aunque conocen bien la oleada de enfrentamiento levantada por los elementos conservadores, las autoridades surcoreanas se portan acorde al estado de humor de esos cadaveres vivos hablando de la "libertad de expresion" y limitandose a "pedirles que se controlen".
					
					Es imposible que esa actitud tibia corrija la situacion que se torna cada vez mas fea.
					
					Tal comportamiento de las autoridades surcoreanas da lo mismo que el acto criminal de alentar la locura de las fuerzas conservadores.
					
					Los crimenes de esas ultimas montan en colera al pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					No perdonaremos nunca el acto grosero e infame de esos gangsteres, que insultaron la sagrada dignidad y simbolo de la RPDC, y la conducta injusta de las autoridades surcoreanas que lo toleraron.
					
					Y nos vemos obligados a considerar en serio las posteriores medidas de accion relativas con los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deberan pedir disculpas a toda la nacion coreana por el presente caso de provocacion politica y tomar las medidas consecuentes para prevenir la repeticion tras castigar duro a los involucrados.
					
					Si se cancelan los acuerdos intercoreanos y las agendas para la participacion del Norte en los Juegos Olimpicos debido a la chusma conservadora que se dedica a injuriar y provocar a la parte connacional, toda la responsabilidad recaera sobre ella y las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					Apreciamos las relaciones de ambas partes coreanas, pero no queremos seguir dando muestras de buena fe e indulgencia hasta cuando veamos la groseria de los maniacos de enfrentamiento que con sus tremendos actos provocadores, desafiaron a los sagrados simbolos de la dignidad de nuestra  Direccion Suprema y nuestro Estado.
					
					Observamos agudamente la posterior postura de las autoridades surcoreanas sobre el presente caso.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la aventura militar de EE.UU. para agravar la situacion regional
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la aventura militar de EE.UU. para agravar la situacion regional
Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ACNC) -- EE.UU. sigue recurriendo a las peligrosas acciones militares desafiando a la aspiracion de todo el mundo al alivio de la tension en la Peninsula Coreana.
					Desde el comienzo del ano nuevo, emplaza uno tras otro las flotillas de portaaviones nucleares y los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares en los alrededores de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Anuncio que realizara dos veces en el proximo mes el lanzamiento de prueba del ICBM.
					
					Esto deja conocer su malsano intento de impedir la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y agravar de nuevo la situacion regional. 
					
					La paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana estan relacionadas directamente con las de la region y el resto del mundo.
					
					Por esta razon, la sociedad internacional aplaude y exhorta a fomentar el ambiente favorable a la mejora de relaciones Norte-Sur, preparado por la iniciativa de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Por el contrario, EE.UU. ejerce abiertamente la presion militar sobre la RPDC y destruye sin vacilacion alguna hasta el equilibrio de fuerzas en la region. 
					
					Esta claro que el lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM no puede ser "fuegos artificiales" de los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.
					
					Hasta los medios de prensa estadounidenses estiman que "los halcones de guerra no disimulan su precaucion por las perspectivas de paz en la Peninsula Coreana". 
					
					Ahora el imperio americano trata de justificar su crimen con las palabras como "aseguramiento de la Olimpiada" y "acciones planificadas", pero no puede ocultar sus malas entranas. 
					
					Cualquier accion militar de EE.UU. se extendera inevitablemente a la agravacion de tension y traera efectos negativos.
					
					La actitud de EE.UU. demuestra claramente que este imperio no desea el dialogo ni la paz sino el enfrentamiento y la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					La realidad ensena de nuevo por que no se implantan por largo tiempo la paz y estabilidad verdaderas en la Peninsula Coreana y la region. 
					
					La RPDC no perdonara nunca las tentativas de vulnerar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y tomara fuertes contramedidas.
					
					EE.UU. no debe olvidar nunca que toda la nacion coreana y la sociedad internacional observan con alta vigilancia su aventura militar.
